KERNEL=="sd*[!0-9]|sr*", ENV{ID_SERIAL}!="?*", SUBSYSTEMS=="scsi", ATTRS{type}=="5",ATTRS{scsi_level}=="[6-9]*", IMPORT{program}="ata_id --export $devnode"
